comments: The Remove Module operations need upgrading to the IModelProvider api...

Attaching fix - to start using IModelProvider api.

Simple patch that is compatible to all J2EE Versions

Sorry need to explain scenario better....

Using the J2EE Module Property sheet on an JEE5 EAR project,
when removing a module (unchecking), an exception is thrown....

Well, this is still an error in RC4. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a Web 2.5 project. 
2. Create an EAR 5 project and add the Web 2.5 one as a J2EE module. 
3. Right click on the EAR 5 --> Properties --> J2EE Module Dependencies. 
4. Uncheck the Web 2.5 project and click OK. 

An UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.
This is disappointing....  I'll investigate for 201
*** Bug 194015 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=72743)
wtp 2.0 patch that prevents the Unsupported..Exc

This patch fixes the problem reported in bug 190009 & in bug 194015

I was also able to reproduce this problem (not exact steps due to differences in code ) in WTP 155
